text: Nivellaru avanedege maraluviri. Allahana vagdanavu khacita satyavagide. Khanditavagiyu avane srstiyannu arambhisuttane mattu avane adannu punaravartisuttane â€“ satyadalli visvasavittu satkarmagalannu madidavarige n'yaya prakara pratiphala nidalikkagi. Atta dhikkarigalige, kudiyuva paniya hagu kathina sikse ide â€“ avaru dhikkarisiddakkagi
